author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Capcom's elusive new game, Pragmata, has resurfaced at Summer Game Fest, this time with a new release window and a little more info on what the heck this game even is.
title: Capcom's Pragmata Reemerges at Sony State of Play

description: Sony kicked off State of Play June 2025 with the surprise announcement of Lumines Arise, from Tetris Effect developer Tetsuya Mizuguchi.

description: A new State of Play has arrived and promises to reveal a glimpse of the future of PS5, and we're here to gather all the biggest announcements throughout the show!

title: Open-World Racing Game CarX Street Coming to Consoles, Pre-Orders Open Now on Xbox

author: Michael Peyton
description: IGN Live is nearly here, as our multi-day celebration of video games and entertainment takes place on June 7 and 8 and promises two days filled with game demos, trailers, exclusive reveals new announcements, panels, contests, stage shows, giveaways, meet-and-greets with IGN personalities, and so much more. To help ensure you don’t miss a thing, you can check out IGN Live’s livestream and video schedule right here.

description: From midnight launches to pre-planned out of stock signs, here's everything you need to know about major retailers' plans for the Nintendo Switch 2 release.

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: If you're looking to save a little cash ahead of the Nintendo Switch 2's release, we've gathered up some of the best Switch 2 deals available at the moment, including discounts on screen protectors, carrying cases, and more.

description: Grab discounted Switch 2 accessories ahead of the launch tomorrow

description: We've played 8 hours already, but there's a lot more road to go.

description: Michael J. Fox and Gibson have officially launched a search for the guitar Marty McFly played in the Enchantment Under the Sea dance scene in the beloved film Back to the Future.

description: I'm holding out on buying the newest Nintendo console.

title: I've Found the Best Magic: The Gathering Gift Ideas That Aren’t Just Booster Packs

author: Tom Marks
description: Switch 2s are only just arriving, so we'll be moving fast to tell you all about it.
title: Where Is Our Nintendo Switch 2 Review?

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Hi, everyone. I have a message for you, from one Elden Ring: Nightreign player to another: please stop beelining  chapels at the start of each game to collect flask charges.
title: Elden Ring: Nightreign PSA: Stop Beelining Chapels for Flask Charges!

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: After months of anticipation, Nintendo’s Switch 2 console has launched. While some might be hoping to walk into a store on June 5 and snag Nintendo’s next-gen offering, customers in Japan are disappointed to find that physical stores are holding off selling Switch 2 on launch day.
title: As Nintendo Switch 2 Launches in Japan, Shops Restrict Sales to Lottery Winners — and Nintendo's Official Stores Aren't Stocking Switch 2 at All

author: Eric Song
description: Still one of the best Windows handheld gaming PCs.
title: The Lenovo Legion Go Gaming Handheld Drops to the Lowest Price Ever on Amazon

author: Eric Van Allen
description: As players dive deeper into Elden Ring Nightreign's launch content, more discoveries are being made and Nightlords felled. Some Nightfarers would like a little bit of assistance, though, when it comes to knowing what's dropped on the ground.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Players Just Want More Info on Items That Have Dropped on the Ground

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Deltarune, the multi-chapter sequel to 2015's indie smash hit Undertale, is currently blowing up on Steam thanks to the release of Chapter 3 and Chapter 4 this morning after years of anticipation.
title: Deltarune Chapters 3 and 4 Are Out Now, and It's Already Exploding on Steam

author: Lex Briscuso
description: In typical dad fashion, it turns out that Hollywood legend Arnold Schwarzenegger was just as shocked as all of us were to see his son, Patrick, showing off his body on Season 3 of The White Lotus.
title: Arnold Schwarzenegger Was Just As Shocked As We Were To See Son Patrick's 'Weenie' in The White Lotus

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: June's Humble Choice lineup features Warhammer 40K: Boltgun, Legacy of Kain Soul Reaver 1&2 Remastered, Nobody Wants to Die, and more. Score all 8 games for $11.99 today.
title: Score Warhammer 40K: Boltgun, Nobody Wants To Die, and More in June’s Humble Choice

author: Tom Phillips
description: Epic Games has detailed its technical specifications for the new version of Fortnite coming to Nintendo Switch 2, and revealed that mouse support would arrive in an imminent patch.
title: Fortnite Switch 2 Technical Specs Revealed: 60FPS, Boosted Resolution, Mouse Controls

author: Matt Kim
description: Mario Kart World is set to join a pantheon of great Nintendo launch games. So we went ahead and ranked the best Day One games Nintendo's newest consoles have come with in history.
title: 10 Best Nintendo Launch Games of All Time

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo Switch 2 requires a day one update to unlock major parts of the console's capabilities, including the ability to play Nintendo Switch 1 games.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Day 1 Update Required for Backwards Compatibility, Nintendo Switch Online, Virtual Game Cards, eShop, More

author: Ben Williams
description: Amazon is selling pre-orders of Pokemon Legends: Z-A on Nintendo Switch 2 for only £52.95, the lowest among major UK retailers.
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A: You Can Save £7 If You Preorder The Switch 2 Edition Today

author: Lex Briscuso
description: The Modern Family family really was, well, family. Rico Rodriguez, who was the show’s beloved son Manny for all 11 seasons of its run, recently revealed that he got “played” into doing various tasks by Sofia Vergara, who starred as his onscreen mom Gloria, during the show’s time on air.
title: Modern Family's Rico Rodriguez Reveals He Got 'Played' Into Doing Things For Sofia Vergara On Set

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Epic Games boss Tim Sweeney believes small teams will soon be able to use AI prompts to make video games on the scale of Nintendo masterpiece The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
title: AI Prompts Will Soon Let a 10-Person Team Build a Game Like Breath of the Wild Where the AI Is Doing All the Dialogue and You Just Write Character Synopsis, Tim Sweeney Predicts

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Disney's live-action Snow White will be released on Disney+ on June 11, 2025, which is a little less than three months after its theatrical debut.
title: Disney's Live-Action Snow White Gets a Disney+ Release Date

author: Tom Phillips
description: Mario Kart World is now available to play, if you have a Switch 2, and Nintendo has just pushed live a day one update for the game. Check out the 1.1.0 patch notes.
title: Mario Kart World Day 1 Update Unlocks Online Play, Allows You To Select More Characters From The Start — Version 1.1.0 Patch Notes Detailed

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Marvel has released a new The Fantastic Four: First Steps trailer that shows baby Franklin Richards for the first time and finally sees THAT line fans have been waiting for.
title: New The Fantastic Four: First Steps Trailer Reveals Baby Franklin Richards — and Yes, They Say the Thing

author: Chris Reed
title: Hey Hey! We Build LEGO The Simpsons: Krusty Burger

author: Jacqueline Thomas
title: AMD Radeon RX 9060 XT Review

author: Tom Phillips
description: A Switch 2 Edition for No Man's Sky will be available alongside the launch of Nintendo's new console, developer Hello Games has announced.
title: No Man's Sky Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Available as Free Upgrade Alongside Console Launch, Supports Cross-Save and Cross-Play

author: Tom Phillips
description: Mario Kart 8's souped-up 200cc difficulty isn't yet included within Switch 2 launch title Mario Kart World — but Nintendo has hinted at the possibility of its reappearance via a post-launch update.
title: Mario Kart World Won't Include 200cc Mode, But Nintendo Isn't Ruling Out it Arriving Post-Launch — 'I'm Afraid I Can't Say Just Yet'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Is the stunning The Witcher 4 tech demo what The Witcher 4 will actually look like? We asked CD Projekt.
title: Is The Witcher 4 Tech Demo What The Witcher 4 Will Actually Look Like? We Asked CD Projekt

author: Vikki Blake
description: Surprise! Unknown Worlds has dropped a new 10-minute Q&A about all things Subnautica 2. Here's everything you need to know.
title: Subnautica 2 Q&A Talks Map Size, Vehicles, And The Return of a Silent Protagonist

author: Vikki Blake
description: The developer of Balatro has confirmed the reason his viral hit poker game doesn't have any microtransactions or ads is because seeing games plastered with advertisements "makes me want to put my computer in the dishwasher and set it to pots and pans."
title: Balatro Doesn't Have the Likes of Microtransactions or In-Game Ads Because They Make Its Creator 'Want to Put My Computer in the Dishwasher'

author: Ben Williams
description: The Switch 2 Pro Controller is back in stock at Amazon UK, being the only other retailer with preorders left.
title: Switch 2 Pro Controller Preorders Are In Stock at Amazon in the UK

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The developers of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 have essentially said "it’s what the Emperor would have wanted" and made a big weapon change in the game not for balance reasons, but because it’s just really, really cool. Check out the Patch 8 Siege mode PTS patch notes for more.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Devs Tear Up the Rulebook, Let the Bulwark Class Use a Thunder Hammer 'Only Because We Think It Will Be Very Cool'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has released a wave of patches for many of its biggest Switch games, ahead of Switch 2's arrival. These free updates are now available to download, and include a fresh version of Super Mario 3D All-Stars — the retro game compilation Nintendo controversially only sold for a limted time.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Updates for Mario, Zelda, Pokémon Switch Games Now Live, Including Unavailable Super Mario 3D All-Stars — Here Are All the Patch Notes

author: Vikki Blake
description: Kinetic Games' terrifying ghost investigation game, Phasmophobia, is getting the Hollywood movie treatment from Blumhouse.
title: Horror Hit Phasmophobia the Next Game to Get a Hollywood Movie Adaptation From Blumhouse

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Fantastic Four: First Steps director Matt Shakman has commented on whether Robert Downey Jr's Doctor Doom will make an appearance in the upcoming movie, and seemingly confirmed the character will be absent.
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Director Claims Doctor Doom 'Not a Part of My Film' but Fans Aren't Convinced

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet looks and performs so much better on the Nintendo Switch 2, in fact, that we're tempted to say the free Switch 2 updates are closer to a light remaster than just an optimization – even though it really should’ve just run better to begin with.
title: Pokémon Scarlet and Violet's Switch 2 Upgrade Is Massive – and it Bodes Well for Legends Z-A

description: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet looks and performs so much better on the Nintendo Switch 2, in fact, that we're tempted to say the free Switch 2 updates are closer to a light remaster than just an optimization – even though it really should’ve just run better to begin with.
title: Pokémon Scarlet and Violet's Switch 2 Upgrade Is Massive – and it Bodes Well for Legends Z-A

author: Adam Mathew
description: It’s a corker of a week for gaming discounts (and very imminent console launches). Basically, your backlog is about to get even heavier.
title: AU Deals: Last Minute Switch 2 Launch Deals, Best Savings on Nightreign, Doom, Ghost of Yotei, and More!
